website_summaries.verdict: The B&O Play Earset earphones offer a warm sound signature and will appeal to retro design fans with money to spend.
pros: Cool retro design, with unique ear hooks that move smoothly on hinges
cons: Warm sound signature not for those seeking crisp definition

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, good looking earphones
customer_reviews.text: I really like these earphones. They fit onto the ear, rather than inside as earbuds do. They do take bit of getting used to, with a bit of judicious jiggling to get them in the right place, but once you've found the spot they feel comfortable and sound great. They have a pretty unusual modern / arty / industrial look to them which you'll either love or hate - I love them. And at a knock down price to boot!
customer_reviews.author: ginner

customer_reviews.title: To big for ears
customer_reviews.text: The product looked good but was only out the box for about 15 minutes. The buds were for to large for the ear. Would like me to see the person who’ve actually could wear them, reckon the bums was about 12 mm in dia. Would have been better with much smaller bus and foam pads to increase the if needed that. As for sound and comfort I am only guessing as they should be spot on for B&A
customer_reviews.author: Jim Landels

customer_reviews.title: Could have been better.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved my B&O A8's... and these do have the same over ear clips we love, they seem to be a little more compromised than they needed to be to fit the electronics and battery.... however I still find them to be very good. My biggest complaint however, is that they appear only to support the old SBC codec, which is not the best for audio quality or latency, since newer bluetooth devices support AAC, or AptX, even AptX-LL (for Low Latency)... so the audio quality is probably not the best that Bluetooth can offer.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Most uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very uncomfortable . Mostly 30 min i can stand em in my ear . Very bad for sport or whatever, sound very low unless u push em , hold it close to ear . Would return but too much hasle with postal office for me . Very dissapointed , should have believed the bad reviews
customer_reviews.author: Xander

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy Rubbish that falls apart!
customer_reviews.text: On their third use, the earhook fell off. It was beyond the month that Amazon allow a return, so I contacted B&O. They were not interested, and although I'd simply put them on and taken them off, B&O claimed this was outside their warranty. Please do not waste your money, they now have pride of place in my bin!
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: All bluetooth in ear phones are appalling
customer_reviews.text: The sound wasn't appalling on these, but the volume is nowhere near loud enough. However comparing to my trusted soundmagic e10 wired in ear phones, there is no comparison, and the e10s are a fraction of the price. The biggest issue though is with the comfort. I wore them for 5 minutes and my ears hurt terribly. Just not a good design.
customer_reviews.author: paul cook

customer_reviews.title: Give that one a miss, not worth the effort or the money spend.
customer_reviews.text: My other half likes them but they’re not for me. Unfortunately B&O doesn’t automatically stand for “wow” ... sound is good but comfort is missing overall... overpriced (original prize) not worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Lang

customer_reviews.title: These aren’t supposed to cancel out sound!
customer_reviews.text: For people who do speed walking, these are perfect. I wanted a quality sound without blocking out surrounding noise so I could hear cars when walking on roads. These are perfect for that. They don’t fit snuggly in your ear like the in ear buds, but they aren’t supposed to! With the cable connecting them and the over ear hooks they are very difficult to lose. A fantastic B&O sound at a fraction of the original price.
customer_reviews.author: mrs claire scott

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because the apple pods just don’t fit in my ear. Other reviews said the ear pieces were big, they are but they don’t need to go right in ear canal but sit comfortably in the ear canal entrance. I use them for running and the clips over the ears mean they stay put. Great sound quality. Very glad I bought them
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. F. C. Lichfield

customer_reviews.title: very very happy
customer_reviews.text: sound quality is excellent, fit is good, connection is awesome, no drop outs, still picks the signal up a good 20m away. These are excellent earphones and for the money I doubt you will get any better. At the end of the day they are Bang and olufsen. They look quality as well Very very happy
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: You’re only buying these for sound quality and comfort.
customer_reviews.text: Biggest issue is the control buttons: they are too small and fiddly to operate, I’ve often pressed the wrong button on the headphone control and disconnected a call because it’s too hard to feel or decipher which one you are pressing. Battery life is no where near quoted times, you’ll roughly get about 3-3.5 hours before charging. Only plus point is they stay in place while running and sound quality it excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Very bad product, prone to breaking and not the standard expected from bang and oulfsen, I would definitely not recommend l.
customer_reviews.author: Shivam

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant product
customer_reviews.text: Once you have set up the headset, the product is fantastic typical Bang and Olufsen quality, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: David l

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding audio quality
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sound & build quality. They look awkward but fit perfectly. Really impressed
customer_reviews.author: willogs78

customer_reviews.text: Battery is poor, fit is ‘unusual’ but I am hoping I will get used to it. It’s well made and sound is good. Will test on a plane later this year.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Plugs on and not in
customer_reviews.text: Good quality sounds, especially if you don't like something inside your ear. Sits comfortably on the ear canal once you have positioned them.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bruce

customer_reviews.title: sound is good
customer_reviews.text: excellent sound very well made head phones the only thing i was dissapointed about they were not noise cancelling
customer_reviews.author: marty68

customer_reviews.title: Battery or bass?
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is not the best and I prefer more bass this didn't deliver so I went back to my Beats.
customer_reviews.author: Miss R Orme

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the cable material grips your skin, dragging the cable to one side, you find yourself constantly adjusting the cable, I leave it dangling down in front of me to stop this happening, This can be a pain, as it gets in the way and is not very safe, but apart from that the product is great.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Bescoby

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Not the sound quality I would expect for the price. I bought a far cheaper true wireless pair from a make I hadn't heard of before that had far superior sound and connectivity and battery life
customer_reviews.author: SJF

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight good headphones.
customer_reviews.text: They shift a bit when running and cycling, don't go as loud as I'd like but otherwise great pair of quality headphones, good battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Mumford

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Bought these due to the brand reputation normally use Bose but seeing the price I jumped at buying 2 pairs unfortunately my wife as small ears and not comfortable for her so I have 2 pair for me happy days
customer_reviews.author: James miller

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality, but a bit fiddly around the ears
customer_reviews.author: gavin boyle

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: These are not noise cancelling earphones. Which is why I got them. They do, however, sound incredible, are very comfortable and look amazing. B&O at their best!!!
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Love the design,quality earphones
customer_reviews.text: Just started using it but looks amazing , good quality and I love easy and clear manual!
customer_reviews.author: emiliak

customer_reviews.title: Best that money can buy.
customer_reviews.text: Present to daughter. Always had one. Each family member has one .
customer_reviews.author: Mr Percy Patel

customer_reviews.title: Failed to pair to iPhone
customer_reviews.text: Good quality in manufacture. However, unable to pair to iPhone and no further review is possible
customer_reviews.author: Peter Watt

customer_reviews.title: Different to earbuds
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is really good but you need to get the positioning just right. They sit on the ear rather than in the ear canal
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Dean

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant earphones
customer_reviews.text: My mum brilliant hear music on earphones in gym or living room
customer_reviews.author: Paul Miller

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality great, not usable at all tho
customer_reviews.text: Earpieces are huge and barely stay in my ear, they definitely wouldn't stay in if I wore them out running which was what I intended to use them for
customer_reviews.author: Jon W.

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic sound .look very cool very comfy . Great product from a world renound manufacturer
customer_reviews.author: Robert D.

product_meta.title: Bang & Olufsen Earset Premium Wireless Earphones - Graphite Brown
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:Graphite Brown| Style Name:Without Accessories

Wireless Bang & Olufsen Signature Sound

Discover world-class wireless Bang & Olufsen Signature Sound with Earset, tuned by the same acclaimed B&O sound engineers that mastered the original Earset earphones of the 1990s. Ergonomics play an important role in the quality of sound that exits an earbud and Earset's customisable positioning perfects this balance of comfort, ambience and powerful sound.

Create your utmost fit

Bang & Olufsen understands that no two ears are the same, so Earset features a flexible adjustment system that lets you individually choose the height of the piston, angle of the earbud and curve of the earhook to your own liking. With this level of customisation, Earset becomes your most comfortable accessory and favourite companion.

Made to last with premium materials

From the robust foundation of anodised aluminium to the smooth and flexible rubber of the adjustable earhooks, Earset exudes durability and design excellence. Experience a fluid hydraulic feeling when customising your fit and enjoy the pristine appearance of deeply integrated colours and laser etched logos. Find optimal protection in the included pouch when your Earset is not in use.

Iconic design evolution

Inspired by Bang & Olufsen design heritage, Earset has been crafted to reflect the same values of comfort and quality that were present in the original Earset of the 1990s. A strong focus on the architecture of the piston and earhook has been carried into Earset's present-day wireless design. These premium wireless earphones have taken on an iconic look with a contemporary touch.

Battery designed to keep you moving

Find power and performance in Earset's built-in rechargeable battery, which offers up to 5 hours of continuous play. When you need to re-charge, use the included USB-C charging cable to bring Earset back to life. Enjoy listening on the move with your luxury wireless Bluetooth earbuds.



BOX CONTAINS
B&O PLAY by Bang & Olufsen Beoplay Earset Wireless Earphones - Graphite Brown
feature_bullets: Bang & olufsen signature sound: Earset delivers exceptional sound quality, mastered by B&O's acclaimed engineers. Earbuds sit just inside the ear for an enjoyable balance of music and ambient sound.

Ideal sound, ideal fit: These premium wireless earphones offer a customised fit through their flexible adjustment system, which lets you change the earbud angle, piston height and earhook curve individually
Carefully selected materials: These polished wireless earphones are crafted with quality anodised aluminium, which offers frictionless adjustment without sacrificing a look of sophistication
Evolution of a design icon: The original earset earphones were crafted in the 1990s, and have since been idealed to bring you a modern version of iconic architecture and ergonomics
Your daily companion: With up to five hours of battery life and an included usb-c charging solution, the earset is designed to last alongside you on your daily adventures
